name: Tricky Wall
description:
Tricky! A simple, beautiful, addictive, skill based game!

Avoid the walls by simply touching anywhere on screen to move the walls, as a wall moves up others move down.

Features:
• Simple to play, requires skill to master!
• Endless arcade gameplay.
• Beautiful isometric graphics.
• Fast and smooth gameplay.
• Changes colour each time you play.
• Collect gems to unlock more balls.
• Leaderboards to challenge your friends & family.
